title: High School Anime Dress Up
description: High School Anime Dress Up is a beauty game where you can create stylish outfits for cute Japanese school girls. There are plenty of clothing options and accessories you can choose from. Design the perfect look, from traditional to trendy. Express your fashion flair and experiment with makeup and hairstyles. Capture your creation with in-game screenshots. Dive into the world of anime fashion, share your designs, and explore a variety of outfits and accessories.
